mapper.select: select qnano, userid,pno,qna_cate_no,qnatitle,qnacontent, reply_content,qnadate,qnastate,qnapw from qna FULL OUTER JOIN reply using(qnaNo) where userid= #{userId} order by qnadate desc
select count(*) from qna where userId = #{userId}
select * from Review where userId = #{userId} order by redate desc
select count(*) from review where userId = #{userId}

select * from cart join product using(pno) where userId=#{userId}
